successes.title: Dwarven Forge's Modular City Builder Terrain System
successes.description: Build the miniature city of your dreams!  Dwarven Forge, makers of fine gamer and dungeon terrain, present our new City Builder System.

Pledges.description: TOURIST: Our gratitude for being a part of the campaign.
(PLEASE NOTE: THIS PLEDGE LEVEL DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR FREE STRETCH GOALS)
COTTAGE (Dungeon Gray): A City Builder Canvas Tote + These Tiles for 1 Building:

- 1X 4"x4" Floor 
- 1X Solid Wall
- 2X Walls w/Center Window Opening
- 1X Wall w/Doorway + Door
- 4X Posts 
- 1X Roof
Your choice of Stone or Tudor style (you choose after the campaign closes).
Your pledge includes free ground shipping within the USA ($15 value).  Recipients outside the US and Canada are responsible for any applicable import duties/fees.
(PLEASE NOTE: THIS PLEDGE LEVEL DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR FREE STRETCH GOALS)
COTTAGE (Expertly Hand Painted): A City Builder Canvas Tote + These Tiles for 1 Building:

- 1X 4"x4" Floor 
- 1X Solid Wall
- 2X Walls w/Center Window Opening
- 1X Wall w/Doorway + Door
- 4X Posts 
- 1X Roof
Your choice of Stone or Tudor style (you choose after the campaign closes).
Your pledge includes free ground shipping within the USA ($15 value).  Recipients outside the US and Canada are responsible for any applicable import duties/fees.
(PLEASE NOTE: THIS PLEDGE LEVEL DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR FREE STRETCH GOALS)

SIGNED VOLUME OF STEFAN'S MAPS & SECRET DUNGEONS.  This pledge level includes the book only, no terrain or stretch goals are included.  (This is also available as an Add-On set for backers at other pledge levels.)
Recipients outside the US and Canada are responsible for any applicable import duties/fees.
UNDERCITY (Dungeon Gray): A Sewer-Only Pledge Level.  No stretch goals are included with this pledge.
Includes a City Builder Canvas Tote + 1 Dungeon Gray Monster Sewer Set (108 pieces).

- 20X  1”x2” Floor Tiles
- 10X  1"x1” Floor Tiles
- 20X  2” Straight Walls
- 10X  Wall Convex Curve
- 6X    Wall Concave Curve
- 14X  1” Straight Wall
- 2X   Ladder Wall
- 2X   Hole Wall
- 2X   Removable Plug
- 2X   Sluice Dead End
- 2X   Sluice T-Junction
- 14X Straight Sluice
- 1X   Sluice 4-Way Crossing
- 2X   Sluice Curve
- 1X   Mystery Miniature
